name: Squircle (Calico Niko)
description:
Torn between two sides, can you restore peace?

(music and some sounds by Mustafa Abbasi)

"This game made me scream"

-Cally (person who made this game)

"You definitely can't play as a circle in this game"

-Also Cally

"Oh, also, download and extrac executabel to play the game with moar performance"

-Cally

"oh and I havent tested the linux executable so it might not actually work" -Cally

"Press P 10 times if you need a cheat code ;)" -Definitely Not Cally
